function.name: message_notify_user
function.description: Send a non-blocking message to the user for progress updates or completion notices.

function.name: message_ask_user
function.description: Ask the user a question and wait for a response.

function.name: file_read
function.description: Read the full content of a specified file.

file_path.description: The absolute path of the file to read.

function.name: file_write
function.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content.

file_path.description: The absolute path of the file to write to.

content.description: The new content for the file.

function.name: file_apply_patch
function.description: Safely modify an existing file by applying a diff patch. Preferred over file_write for modifications.

file_path.description: The absolute path of the file to patch.

patch_content.description: Content of the patch in a unified diff format.

function.name: shell_exec
function.description: Execute a shell command in a specified directory.

exec_dir.description: The working directory for the command.

function.name: codebase_search
function.description: Perform a semantic search across the codebase to find relevant files or code snippets.

query.description: The natural language query to search for.

function.name: invoke_agent
function.description: Used by the Workflow Composer to invoke another specialized agent.

agent_name.description: The name of the agent to invoke (e.g., 'Developer').

task_description.description: The specific task for the agent to perform.
